page.title: 03Leachfield Grange Farm.
page.content: This farm belongs to Mr.N.Bell.It has four hundred and four acres.Inmost of the four hundred and four acres wheat is grown.The farm is a mixture of growing crops and keeping stock.The stock is beef cattle and sheep.We visited the farm in July and the crops we saw were wheat,barley,corn,sugar beet,peas,oil seed rape and linseed. There are four people who work on the farm as well as the farmer.In the Second World War there were seven people.Less people are needed to work on a farm nowadays because machines do a lot of the work peole used to do and they do it quicker. Mr.Bell had taken some of the hedges out in small fields so the tractor could work more easily.
